sentence.Network_en: Gossamer is floating in calm air.
The prince helped the princess, who was still in her delightful gossamer gown.

list.abs: ...白雪姬(white gossamer)，属鸭跖草科鸭跖草属，多年生肉质草本植物，原产中南美洲的危地马拉，伯利兹，墨西哥等国，它别名白绢草，宜温暖，湿润的环境和充足而柔和的阳光，耐半阴和干旱，不耐寒，.
This is gossamer season ., 这是游丝的季节.
photo Gallery : underwater Scenes A gossamer parasol spreads its feathery arms to catch plankton in the Caribbean waters of the Cayman Islands .海底世界景色的图片。一个小蜘蛛网阳伞伸展其羽毛般的肢体捕捉浮游生物在加勒比地区水域的开曼群岛。
Galileo's imaging system found that the gossamer ring vanished abruptly beyond the orbit of the Amalthea .从伽利略号的影像系统发现，薄纱环在木卫五轨道之外就突然消失了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: apparently from goose + summer, perhaps from the time of year around St Martin's summer, i.e. early November, when geese were eaten (gossamer being common then)

entry.tran: 蛛丝般的；轻薄的；纤细的
entry.def: You use gossamer to indicate that something is very light, thin, or delicate.

example.ex: ...the daring gossamer dresses of sheer black lace.
example.tran: 完全以黑色蕾丝为材质的样式大胆的轻薄衣裙

means.word_mean: 1. a gauze fabric with an extremely fine texture

sentences.sentence: "this smallest and most ethereal of birds"

means.word_mean: 2. so thin as to transmit light;
